title: Drawing, "Contemporary American Industrial Design Exhibition, Metropolitan Museum of Art, 1934: Dining Table", 1934
medium: Graphite, green and red color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Office stamp in black ink in lower left corner [partially cut off]: DESKEY/ON AVENUE/RK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in lower right corner: SCALE 1" - 1'0" [underlined]/METROPOLITAN - MUSEUM/EXHIBITION-DINING-ROOM [all underlined]; in lower right corner in circle: #/6085/SPEC.; inscribed in graphite with dimensions and materials throughout.
description: Drawing for dining room table for 1934 Metropolitan Museum of Art Exhibition. Rectangular frosted mirror table top with center reflector of etched glass; polished chrome around border of table top on side, and California redwood burl below. Polished chrome legs rounded at end and form U-shape. Legs supported by small base of California redwood burl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Contemporary American Industrial Design Exhibition, Metropolitan Museum of Art, 1934: Dining Table", 1934.
1934. Graphite, green and red color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1845.
